page.title: 06HOME LIFE Pentney & Narboro'
page.content:
{Food:}Narborough has some food shops but Pentney has none and therefore most families in the area shop either in King's Lynn or Swaffham and supplement their purchases with home grown fruit and vegetables. Fresh food tradesmen call at the villages each week and milk is delivered daily.
{Quality of Life:}Most households are equipped with modern appliances and heated adequately. Many families keep pets, some more exotic than others. Several clubs and organisations exist for the whole family to enjoy. There is a cinema in King's Lynn. A mobile library calls monthly. Many develop their own hobbies and outdoor pursuits like fishing, shooting, and riding. A local hunt often starts from Pentney. Dangers exist in a rural environment and care needs to be taken.
